pr_title: chore: partition by null should set key format to NONE

timeline.message:
chore: partition by null should set key format to NONE

fixes: https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6391

timeline.bodyText: did you mean to return here?
timeline.author: agavra

timeline.bodyText: why is this an error? can't I have null keys with non-NONE formats?
timeline.author: agavra

replies.bodyText: If the key format supports schema inference then it's going to blow up later when trying to build the schema for the key.
replies.author: big-andy-coates
